name: blaster
description: One and done with humans, might take a few rounds with a robot!

name: harpoon
description: The T2 Harpoon can pierce through even the highest grade of metal!

name: neuralyzer
description: This is a neuralyzer, you can use this to fight the rouge robots.

name: tablet
description: Syncs you to main board in the Control Lab. Get camera feed, seal off sector doors, and link cable to AI for configurations.

name: memory
description: A 5 Petabyte memory chip used for storing the vast neural networks of quantum-machine learned consciousnesses.

name: interface
description: A USB-G Interface with SDI cable. Used for large capacity high speed data transfer.

name: motherboard
description:
A M2 Pro Apple Silicon motherboard.
Advanced material BUS capable of fiberoptic data transfer allows for relatively quick download of massive amount if information.
